description: Nickel is a corrosion-resistant metal widely used in stainless steel, alloys, and plating. It provides strength, durability, and resistance to high temperatures. Nickel-based alloys appear in turbines, electronics, and chemical equipment. The metal also plays a major role in rechargeable batteries, particularly in lithium-ion technologies. While some people may be sensitive to nickel contact, its industrial usefulness remains vast and well-established.
name: Nickel
